Further implementation of CFE Treaty
	Schedule 1 amends the Arms Control and Disarmament (Inspections) Act [1991(c. 41)](/id/ukpga/1991/41?view=plain "Go to item of legislation") inpursuance of the Treaty on Conventional Armed Forces in Europe signed in Parison 19th November 1990, as amended by the Agreement signed in Istanbul on 19thNovember 1999 on Adaptation of that Treaty.
	The repeals set out in Schedule 2 have effect.
Implementation of future revisions to CFE Treaty
	Her Majesty may by Order in Council make such provision modifying the ArmsControl and Disarmament (Inspections) Act 1991 as appears to Her Majestynecessary or expedient for giving effect to further amendments relating toinspections made to the Treaty on Conventional Armed Forces in Europe signedin Paris on 19th November 1990.
	An Order in Council may not be made under this section unless a draft ofthe Order has been laid before, and approved by resolution of, each House ofParliament.
Short title, commencement and extent
	This Act may be cited as the Arms Control and Disarmament (Inspections) Act2003.
	This Act shall come into force on such day as the Secretary of State may byorder made by statutory instrument appoint.
	This Act extends to Northern Ireland.
	The power in section 6(4) of the Arms Control and Disarmament (Inspections)Act [1991 (c. 41)](/id/ukpga/1991/41?view=plain "Go to item of legislation")(power to extend that Act to certain overseas territories) applies tomodifications to that Act made by or under this Act as it applies to theprovisions of that Act.
